mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_settlement( id, order_id, user_id, settlement_amount, status, create_date, settlement_date, settlement_user_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{orderId}, #{userId}, #{settlementAmount}, #{status}, #{createDate}, #{settlementDate}, #{settlementUserId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE order_settlement SET order_id = #{orderId}, user_id = #{userId}, settlement_amount = #{settlementAmount}, status = #{status}, settlement_date = #{settlementDate}, settlement_user_id = #{settlementUserId} WHERE id = #{id}
